00005 // to developers, we are using the SDL keymap to get us started, large portions
00006 // are directly copy/pasta'd, so we included their license too

00024 MetaCode::MetaCode()
00025 {}
00026 
00027 MetaCode::MetaCode(int MetaValue_, short unsigned int ID_, InputCode Code_)
00028 {
00029     SetMetaValue(MetaValue_);
00030     SetID(ID_);
00031     SetCode(Code_);
00032 }
00033 
00034 MetaCode::MetaCode(RawEvent _RawEvent)
00035 {
00036     //TODO: Actually process each event
00037     //Make a metacode for each event and return it
00038     switch(_RawEvent.type)
00039     {
00040         case SDL_KEYDOWN:
00041             break;
00042         case SDL_KEYUP:
00043             break;
00044         case SDL_MOUSEMOTION:
00045             break;
00046         case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN:
00047             break;
00048         case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONUP:
00049             break;
00050         case SDL_JOYAXISMOTION:
00051             break;
00052         case SDL_JOYBUTTONDOWN:
00053             break;
00054         case SDL_JOYBUTTONUP:
00055             break;
00056         case SDL_JOYBALLMOTION:
00057             break;
00058         case SDL_JOYHATMOTION:
00059             break;
00060         default:
00061             throw ("Unknown SDL Event Inserted");
00062             break;
00063     }
00064 }
00065

00067 {
00068     return this->MetaValue;

00083     this->MetaValue=MetaValue_;

00094 }

00096 bool MetaCode::operator==(const MetaCode &other) const
00097 {
00098     if(this->Code == other.Code && this->MetaValue == other.MetaValue)
00099     {
00100         return true;
00101     }else{
00102         return false;
00103     }
00104 }

00108 // PhysEventUserInput
00109 PhysEventUserInput::PhysEventUserInput()
00110 {
00111 
00112 }
00113 
00114 PhysEventUserInput::PhysEventUserInput(MetaCode Code_)
00115 {
00116     Code.push_back(Code_);
00117 }
00118 
00119 PhysEventUserInput::PhysEventUserInput(vector<MetaCode> Code_)
00120 {
00121     for(unsigned int c=0; Code_.size()>c ; c++)
00122     {
00123         Code.push_back(Code_.at(c));
00124     }
00125 }
00126 
00127 PhysEventUserInput::~PhysEventUserInput()
00128 {
00129 
00130 }
00131 
00132 MetaCode PhysEventUserInput::GetCode(unsigned int Index)
00133 {
00134     return Code.at(Index);
00135 }
00136 
00137 unsigned int PhysEventUserInput::GetCodeCount()
00138 {
00139     return Code.size();
00140 }
00141 
00142 void PhysEventUserInput::AddCode(MetaCode _Code)
00143 {
00144     Code.push_back(_Code);
00145 }
00146 
00147 void PhysEventUserInput::ToggleCode(MetaCode _Code)
00148 {
00149     vector<MetaCode>::iterator iter;
00150 
00151     for(iter=Code.begin(); Code.end()!=iter ; iter++)
00152     {
00153         if(*iter == _Code)
00154         {
00155             Code.erase(iter);
00156         }else{
00157             Code.push_back(_Code);
00158         }
00159     }
00160 }
00161 
00162 void PhysEventUserInput::ToggleCode(unsigned int Index)
00163 {
00164     Code.erase(Code.begin()+Index);
00165 }
00166 
00167 EventType PhysEventUserInput::getEventType()
00168 {
00169     return UserInput;
00170 }
